SELECT ac.category_id as categoryId, ac.category_name AS categoryName, ac.remark, su.nickname AS createUserName, ac.create_time AS createTime, ac.update_time AS updateTime FROM article_category ac LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON ac.create_user = su.user_id WHERE ac.is_deleted = 0
AND ac.category_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{params.categoryName}, '%')
AND su.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{params.createUserName}, '%')
ORDER BY ac.create_time DESC
